title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
summary: Understanding the two systems that drive the way we think. Kahneman explores the cognitive biases and errors that influence decision-making, offering insights into the dual systems governing human thought processes.

author: Viktor E. Frankl
